item.title: Patent Granted: Manage multiple 2D apps in a 3D layout
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: In our day-to-day work, we often create methods, processes, approaches, or features to address specific needs and challenges. item.title: Exploring the Potential of XR Technology for Virtual Decoration
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: In recent years, XR technology has revolutionized the way we decorate our physical environments. By utilizing AI and computer vision, XR can scan and track real-world surroundings, recognizing and remembering images and objects to enable the addition of virtual content. This technology can store and recall virtual decorations, making them visible every time someone enters the environment. While image matching is not a new concept, XR platforms like Vuforia have already implemented various mobile XR examples.

item.title: eXtending the Reality of Museum with XR
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: eXtended Reality (XR/AR/VR) technology is changing the reality of almost every industry today by enhancing user experiences. XR adoption in the museum industry is also quite natural, let’s understand how it is shaping up the Museums of Future. Museum is a place that displays artifacts from history, culture, science, art and more. As per International Council of Museums (ICOM), there are around 55000 museums worldwide designed with different themes serving different types of artifacts.
